  • Description: HAZMAT RESPONDER WAS CALLED ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. RESPONDER INSTRUCTED TO SUPERVISOR TO CLEAR THE AREA. RESPONDER THEN GOES AND FOLLOWS DESICION TREE FOR PROPER CLEAN UP AND PROCEEDS TO BRING PACKAGE BACK TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
